description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Zamo LLC is looking for 10 Senior Java Developers (all levels). Join us and have a chance to:
              
              - Work on Big Data, IoT, Microservices domains.
              
              - Develop smsmart/autonomousetail store systems.
              
              - Participate in the development stage of projects.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Broad background in Computer Science, especially with Data Structures & Algorithm.
              
              - Good knowledge of OOP.
              
              - Good Java coding skill.
              
              - Basic understanding of Scrum and Agile.
              
              - Demonstrated organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
              
              - Able to work with "Can-Do" spirit.
              
              - Fair English speaking, reading and writing.
              
              - For Senior:
              
              + Solid Java experience and knowledge of threading, concurrency, web services (RESTful).
              
              + Good understanding of OOD / OOD principles and design patterns.
              
              + J2EE experience that includes web frameworks, Servlet, JSP, application servers.
              
              + Good knowledge of Spring, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Hibernate.
              
              + Good knowledge of RDMBS, SQL and data modeling.
              
              + Well versed with Maven, JUnit, Git and other development tools.
              
              + At least 3 years of experience in Java software development.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Annual Health check
               







                Annual Company trip
               







                Friendly & Active working environment
